sentences: Some of Lisa's theatrical play roles have included: Anna Karenina and Johanna in Sweeney Todd at the Gate Theatre; Oonagh in Jimmy's Hall and Lil - written especially for her- in The Country Girls by Edna O'Brien, and Patsy in The Unmanageable Sisters at the Abbey Theatre; Sorcha in Ross O'Carroll-Kelly's The Last Days of the Celtic Tiger, Breaking Dad, Between Foxrock and a Hard Place at the Gaiety Theatre and Nora in A Doll's House at the Helix Theatre.
She played Elizabeth O'Farrell in The Bloody Irish, written for PBS in 2015.
Lisa was a member of Celtic Woman from 2010 to 2014 during which time she appeared on the albums: Believe, Home For Christmas, and Emerald: Musical Gems.
